channel.title: [New]Need Help[New]
channel.description:
Hey all.
I am the owner of ILLegalPvp. But I have just started my server its an unique one I have thing that i have never seen on any 525 b4 some then no all :P
and my main problem now it to gain members. i tried moparscape server status page, need to wait ... tried runelocos my adv is there.
does some one else know any other way to adv my server on a legit way ? not spamming other servers forums etc.
THIS IS NO ADV THIS IS ASKING FOR HELP HOW TO ADV !
Greetings,
Metalic M4ge

item.title: [New]Need Help[New]
item.dc:creator: @Metalic_M4ge Metalic M4ge
item.description:
@Metalic_M4ge wrote:

[quote=“zane02, post:9, topic:315229”]1.) dont advertise here.
2.) what was the point in making this topic? not to be mean but your stopping people who ACTUALLY need HELP with this non sence…[/quote]

if you did take the shit out of your eye’s you would have seen i needed help with adving and was wondering if some ppl knew an good adv site or w/e.
second noob read the fucking post before you talk i said pm me ! i didnt put it here so its no adv :S
and i just asked an questions of where he installed the files how the FUCK is that ADV you retarded twat.

Read full topic

item.title: [New]Need Help[New]
item.dc:creator: @Metalic_M4ge Metalic M4ge
item.description:
@Metalic_M4ge wrote:

[quote=“Nuggetdabest, post:2, topic:315229”]Well this is a stupied way to do it i think but try this:

Go to www.youtube.com/ and Upload a video of your server.
Also try advertising on places such as: http://www.moparisthebest.com/ www.silabsoft.org etc. Try making a Banner. Like GodzHellPK or w/e.But make sure you have a few people first. Butyou have to make sure your server has alot of cool stuff so they don’t have to wait and wait for something good.

This might have not of helped but well
P.S I am not advertising[/quote]

Hey man thanks
np you gave an idea and thats what counts
btw I HAVE COOL STUFF pm me and i will give you client link you will love it !

and thanks for your post

Read full topic
